channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 新韩金融公司首席执行官表示，韩国将有可能在今年上半年结束前取消卖空禁令，因为政策制定者希望韩国市场与全球标准接轨。
item.description: South Korea will likely lift a ban on short selling by the end of the first half of the year as policymakers want to align its markets to global standards, Shinhan Financial’s CEO says trib.al/zN9s8QU

item.title: 一月份是有记录以来最热的月份，全球平均气温比前工业化时代的平均气温高出 1.66C
item.description: January was the warmest on record, with global average temperatures 1.66C above the average during pre-industrial times trib.al/T7fzxbN

item.title: 据该公司首席执行官称，为购买刚果民主共和国所有人工开采的钴矿而成立的国有公司在经历了多年的拖延之后，可能在三个月内开始运营
item.description: The state-owned company created to buy all of Democratic Republic of Congo’s hand-dug cobalt could start operating within three months after years of delays, according to its CEO trib.al/mGtPi0V

item.title: 莫桑比克概述了一项提高水电生产的计划，旨在将其经济转型为绿色能源并推动工业化进程
item.description: Mozambique outlines a plan to boost hydropower production in a bid to transition its economy to green energy and drive industrialization trib.al/iQfWX5i

item.title: 众议院委员会正在调查拜登政府暂停液化天然气出口审批的决定
item.description: A House committee is probing the Biden administration’s decision to pause liquefied natural gas export approvals trib.al/80zXqYm

item.title: 塞尔维亚总统亚历山大-武契奇密切关注美联储和欧洲央行的动向，预计将维持利率不变
item.description: Serbia is expected to leave interest rates unchanged with President Aleksandar Vucic keeping an eye on the Fed and ECB trib.al/9ASv4GK

item.title:
新消息：库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）在《鸟战》（Battle for the Bird）一书中展示了杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）让埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拯救推特的计划如何导致了该平台目前的窘境。
点击这里阅读节选 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: Kurt Wagner’s book Battle for the Bird shows how Jack Dorsey’s plan to get Elon Musk to save Twitter contributed to the platform’s current dilemma.

Read an excerpt here ⬇️ trib.al/5TWWurd

item.title: 生物技术公司 Kyverna Therapeutics 突破 IPO 目标，筹资 3.19 亿美元
item.description: Biotech Kyverna Therapeutics Tops IPO Goal to Raise $319 Million trib.al/EjKploE

item.title: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨将发表全国大选前最后一次国情咨文演讲
item.description: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa will deliver his last state-of-the-nation address before the country holds national elections trib.al/wdDZdwf

item.title: @Johnauthers 说，至少在 11 月大选之前，特朗普 2.0 现在是投资者的基本设想。但正确的赌注可能并不明显
item.description: Trump 2.0 is now the base-case scenario for investors until the November elections, at least, says @johnauthers. But the right bets may not be the obvious ones trib.al/LSTONIG

item.title: 从经济停滞到房地产困境，德国面临着一连串的问题。信贷投资者打赌这些问题不会很快消失
item.description: From economic stagnation to real-estate woes, Germany has a litany of problems. Credit investors are betting they're not going away soon trib.al/Ie3RMmN

item.title: 这些投资者认为，不考虑环境变化可能是一个代价高昂的错误
item.description: These investors argue that failing to consider environmental change could be a costly mistake trib.al/ex1VW5C

item.title: 一个新的数据集可让任何人从英国 2,500 多个火车站的每一个出发点探索近 10 亿次旅程
item.description: A new dataset allows anyone to explore almost 1 billion journeys from every one of Britain’s more than 2,500 train stations trib.al/VfDFHva

item.title: 迪斯尼发布了乐观的年度利润展望，理由是成本削减带来的收益以及国际主题公园的强劲表现
item.description: Disney issued an upbeat profit outlook for the year, citing cost-cutting benefits and the strong performance of its international theme parks trib.al/aWRozLa

item.title: 印度央行连续第六次会议维持关键基准利率不变，并发出了利率将在更长时间内保持较高水平的信号
item.description: India’s central bank leaves its key benchmark interest rate unchanged for a sixth straight meeting, and signals rates will stay higher for longer trib.al/XTUc35c

item.title: 新加坡人跨越边境到马来西亚过农历新年，这个节日还有另一个值得庆祝的理由：当地的美元汇率创下历史新高，使得所有东西相对于林吉特都要便宜得多。
item.description: Singaporeans crossing the border to Malaysia for the Lunar New Year have another reason to celebrate this festive season: an all-time high local dollar that makes everything that much cheaper against the ringgit trib.al/rnU4gZs

item.title: RT by @markets：印度富豪高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）重返财富超过 1000 亿美元的精英俱乐部。根据彭博亿万富豪指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index），他现在是全球第 12 大富豪，仅次于穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）。@talktosanjai 报道
item.description: Indian tycoon Gautam Adani has returned to the elite club of people with fortunes above $100 billion. He’s now the 12th-richest person in the world, just one spot behind Mukesh Ambani, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. @talktosanjai reports trib.al/mKDLFmy

item.title: 新加坡立法者周三否决了反对党的一项动议，该动议建议政府进一步动用国家储备来帮助抵消不断上涨的成本。
item.description: Singapore lawmakers on Wednesday rejected an opposition motion suggesting the government should further dip into the national reserves to help offset rising costs trib.al/DqJ2XSz

item.title: 中国大宗商品行业正步入农历新年假期，经济通缩根深蒂固，市场供过于求
item.description: China's commodities sector is heading into the Lunar New Year break on a glum note, with deflation embedded in the economy and markets looking oversupplied trib.al/AY53Zmr

item.title: 日本央行一位高级官员表示，即使在负利率结束后，也很难看到日本央行持续、快速地提高政策利率
item.description: A top Bank of Japan official said it’s hard to see the bank raising its policy rate continuously and rapidly even after the negative interest rate is ended trib.al/Vyd464v

item.title: 消息人士称，复星集团在出售香港山顶再保险公司的计划失败后，重新启动了这一计划
item.description: Fosun has revived a plan to sell Hong Kong-based Peak Reinsurance after failing on a previous attempt, sources say trib.al/xGWn1OY

item.title: 中国上月消费价格创下全球金融危机以来最快降幅，世界第二大经济体正努力摆脱持续通货紧缩的压力
item.description: China’s consumer prices fell last month at the fastest pace since the global financial crisis as the world’s second-largest economy struggles to shake off persistent deflation pressures trib.al/1KZZ5Ym

item.title: 中国政府出人意料地撤换了证券监管机构的负责人，从而表明了阻止 7 万亿美元股市崩盘的坚定决心，此后中国股市上涨。
item.description: Chinese shares gained after authorities signaled a stronger resolve to stem a $7 trillion rout via a surprise move to replace the head of the country’s securities regulator trib.al/0rXsaP4

item.title: 贝莱德（BlackRock）表示，当日本央行结束负利率和美联储削减借贷成本时，金融市场将面临比许多人预期更大的波动风险。
item.description: Financial markets are at risk of more volatility than many people expect when the the Bank of Japan ends its negative interest rate and the Federal Reserve cuts borrowing costs, according to BlackRock trib.al/UHgE9er

item.title: 美国国会预算办公室称，移民人数的激增将在未来十年内通过扩大劳动力和增加需求，帮助美国经济增长约 7 万亿美元。
item.description: The surge in immigration will help bolster the US economy by about $7 trillion over the next decade by swelling the labor force and increasing demand, the Congressional Budget Office says trib.al/tLjWspR

item.title: 几周来，中国主要证券监管机构的工作人员一直在夜以继日地研究如何支撑中国跌跌不休的股市，而这一重磅炸弹就这样降临了
item.description: Staffers at China’s main securities regulator had been working around the clock for weeks on ways to prop up the nation’s tumbling stock market when the bombshell dropped trib.al/uxdsCwu

item.title: 自中国政府禁止比特币行业以来，中国的比特币矿工们辗转于各个国家。现在，他们在埃塞俄比亚找到了新的避风港
item.description: Chinese Bitcoin miners have bounced from country to country since Beijing banned the industry. Now they've found a new haven in Ethiopia trib.al/7bKf3No

item.title: 在过去三年里，量化对冲基金的计算机模型帮助它们超越了竞争对手基金的人类交易员。
item.description: China’s deepening stock-market slump is even taking its toll on quantitative hedge funds, whose computer models have helped them outperform human traders at rival funds for the past three years trib.al/8gdiFk7

item.title: 在英国，为跳槽者加薪以抵御通胀的效果正在减弱，起薪的增长速度是 34 个月以来最慢的
item.description: Inflation-busting pay raises for those who change jobs are fading in Britain, with starting salaries climbing at the slowest pace in 34 months trib.al/rKchrTL

item.title: 日本最大的商业银行正在中央银行的负利率账户中积累资金--这是世界上最后一项零利率政策即将结束的又一迹象
item.description: Japan’s biggest commercial banks are letting money accumulate in negative interest-rate accounts at the central bank — another sign that the world’s last sub-zero rate policy is coming close to the end trib.al/6dPA1h5
